channel.title: Witch[Neutral Wildcard]
channel.description:
Note: This idea is not my own and taken from another mafia site, I also don't expect this to be accepted, I kinda just want to see what people will think of it
*Immune to Convert*
**Magical Shield(Passive)** - You are immune to death at night and to the Magical Plague **Magical Plague(Passive)** - If you live for 3 further nights after a hex is activated, the Magical Plague will arrive at the castle and kill ABSOLUTELY EVERYONE (except you because of **Magical Shield**) **Hex(Night)** - Hex a player, this lasts 2 nights and will not be notified, if a player is attacked while a hex is on them, the hex becomes activated, an announcement will be made "You hear a menacing cackle from somewhere" to all players - Infinite Uses *Your Objective is to successfully bring the Magical Plague to the castle*
Notes: Yes this class is stupidly powerful, but that's the price you have to pay when literally everyone will want you dead once they hear the cackling and every faction will be hunting you down
I was also thinking of adding this to FoL but it might not be too popular lul

item.title: Witch[Neutral Wildcard]
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
JammySplodge:

why would you want to prove you’re the assassin

Consider this… it’s the last lynch, and the Witch is STILL alive. You are the Assassin and under suspicion of being Witch…

item.title: Witch[Neutral Wildcard]
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Yeah and that is terrible for Unseen… BD has an advantage there, revealing their identity is not as damaging for BD as it is for Unseen, let alone neutral killers who will likely be caught in the mess… Alch can blur, Assassin can distract to prove…

Read full topic

item.title: Witch[Neutral Wildcard]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Unknown:

Hmm and yeah I dont like this.

The evil killers will try to get the most scummy people at night which cannot be good for them. If the clock is at 1 before death the Evil faction might even sacrifice someone(Seeker, Mastermind…) to relay info… because they can simply not win when all die, as opposed to when only 2 of them die and one is unknown.

Expect a massclaim after cackling because the witch cannot reliably fakeclaim certain classes. Even the most sheepish, sluggish, peaceful BD will turn into a mob after cackling.

the point of the class is to shake up the game and make people panic
it makes it have a lasting effect on the game even when it’s killed

Read full topic

item.title: Witch[Neutral Wildcard]
item.dc:creator: Unknown
item.description:
Indeed…
Those who will be your enemies no matter what:
1.Blue Dragon.
2.Unseen/Cult
3.Possessor
4.Alchemist
5.King
6.Reaper

Those who might be your enemies or not(depends on the situation):

  1. Fool. Might try to be the “Witch” and get hanged. If not possible tho, then they will try to get you asap(e.g. cackling and imprisoned twice, caught by Observer as butler and the like…)
  2. Scorned. If the target is hanged then they can win regardless of plague. If not then they might try to get their target hanged as witch. If that ain’t possible however, then they will join the horde.
    3.Mercenary. If the target is someone else they must stop you. If their target is you, the witch, and they know that… then they will be your only reliable help… they even could try to appear as witch themselves(because they dont need to survive, their target does)

Read full topic
